title: Mayor Eric Adams | Trump Doubles Down on Calling Putin "Smart," Gets Confused on Fox News: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Russia launching a full-scale military assault on Ukraine, surprising everyone except the leader of the Republican Party Donald Trump.

Then, New York City Mayor Eric Adams talks about the early days of his first term, his plans to address the city’s subway system and garbage and the criticism of his recent appointments.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
